content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

0->5->7->8->11->12->7

In this graph, the shortest path from node 5 to node 7 is through nodes 7, 8, 11, and 12. Therefore, the shortest path is 0->5->7->8->11->12->7. Please note that this is the shortest path in the graph and it does not include any other possible paths.

0->7->5

In this graph, the shortest path from node 7 to node 5 is through node 5. Therefore, the shortest path is 0->7->5. Please note that this is the shortest path in the graph and it does not include any other possible paths.
